pages.text: The $(item)Otherworld Goggles$() give the wearer permanent $(thing)Third Eye$(), allowing to view even blocks hidden from those partaking of $(l:getting_started/datura)Demons's Dream$(/l). They will, however, not give the ability to harvest otherworld materials, for this special tools or the use of Demon's Dream is required, depending on the type of material.

Otherworld Goggles make use of a Foliot bound into the lenses. The Foliot shares it's ability to view higher planes with the wearer, thus allowing them to see otherworld materials. The required summoning is relatively simple, making crafting these goggles a common apprentice summoner task.
